descriptionHTML:
MonoChrono watch face for Android Wear smartwatches: Huawei Watch, Sony SmartWatch, Motorola Moto 360, Tag Heuer, Fossil Q, LG G Watch, Asus ZenWatch etc. MonoChrono Watch Face for business. Stylish & Elegant. This watchface is compatible with all Android Wear watches.

MonoChrono Watch Face features:
✔ Support both round and square displays
✔ Watchface for Android Wear watches
✔ 24-hour time format
✔ Ambient mode
✔ Display seconds

How to use MonoChrono Watch Face for Android Wear smartwatches:
1. Once you install the app, the MonoChrono watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch. This may take a few minutes. You may have to wait for a while.
2. From smartwatches: Long press your watchface and select the one that you have installed.
From mobile: Run the "Android Wear" app and tap "More" button in the watchface section.
3. Enjoy your new MonoChrono Watch Face for Android Wear!
